title: Zepto SDE 3 | Offer | Accepted
content:
Education: M.Tech in ECE (B.Tech Tier 2 college, M.Tech Tier 1 college)
Years of Experience: 7
Prior Experience: SeviceNow Senior Software Engineer

Date of the Offer: May 2024
Company: Zepto
Title/Level: Senior Software Engineer
Location: Bengaluru, India
Salary: 70L
Joining Bonus: 10L
Stock bonus: 60L esops grant vested over 4 years
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): 95L

Other details: This was their first offer. Did not need to negotiate or even mention about Amazon offer.

Had another offer from Amazon SDE 2. TC - 77 L (47L Base + 25L JB + 5L Stocks first year).
Chose Zepto over Amazon.

Difference in comp was huge for similar WLB. If if would have been Google or Linkedin, with a bit more money, I would have chosen them.

title: Google | Software Engineer University Graduate | L3 | Bangalore, India | Offcampus
content:
Education: B.Tech in CSE from Tier 3 College
Years of Experience: 3 months
Prior Experience: SDE Intern at a Startup
Date of the Offer: April, 2024
Company: Google
Title/Level: SWE University Graduate (L3)
Location: Bangalore, India
Salary: 21L INR
Relocation: 3L INR
Signing Bonus: 1.5L INR
Stock bonus: $32.5K stock grant vested over 4 years
Bonus: 3.15L per year (based on performance)
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): ~40L INR (1st year)
Benefits: Standard Google benefits

Few information about me - 
* I was not into CP. I solved problems only on LeetCode and GFG. Solved over 1.3k problems on LeetCode and over 900 on GFG practice. LeetCode contest rating is around 2000 (~100 contests).
* I have knowledge of MERN Stack development and Next.js.
* Gave all my rounds in Feb, 2024 and got the offer 8 weeks later!
* Will add the interview experience in few days and add here!
